com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass>
      • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    ContextClass - the class will holds the Context responsible for the command
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmartCommands.GuardedHandler, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand
    Enclosing class:
    SmartCommands

    public abstract static class SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>
extends SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass>
    A handy SmartCommands.GuardedCommand which will issue systematically a log when an exception occurs during the command execution, and will trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the original exception in that case.
    Since:
    2012.01.25

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String warningDisplayMessage 
      protected java.lang.String warningLogMessage 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand(ContextClass context, java.lang.Object component, java.lang.String warningLogMessage, int warningDisplayMessageResourceId)
      Same as SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand#SimpleGuardedCommand(Context, Object, String, String) with the last parameter equal to context.getString(warningDisplayMessageResourceId).
      SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand(ContextClass context, java.lang.Object component, java.lang.String warningLogMessage, java.lang.String warningDisplayMessage)
      Creates a new SmartCommands.GuardedCommand, which will issue a warning log and then trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException, if an exception occurs during its execution.
      SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand(ContextClass context, java.lang.String warningLogMessage, int warningDisplayMessageResourceId)
      Same as SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand#SimpleGuardedCommand(Context, Object, String, String) with the second parameter set to null and last parameter equal to context.getString(warningDisplayMessageResourceId).
      SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand(ContextClass context, java.lang.String warningLogMessage, java.lang.String warningDisplayMessage)
      Equivalent to calling SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand#SimpleGuardedCommand(Context, Object, String, String) with the second argument being null.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Throwable onThrowable(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      The implementation will log as a warning the exception.

                                          java.lang.String warningLogMessage,
                                          int warningDisplayMessageResourceId)
        Same as SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand#SimpleGuardedCommand(Context, Object, String, String) with the second parameter set to null and last parameter equal to context.getString(warningDisplayMessageResourceId).

      • SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand

        public SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand(ContextClass context,
                                          java.lang.String warningLogMessage,
                                          java.lang.String warningDisplayMessage)
        Equivalent to calling SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand#SimpleGuardedCommand(Context, Object, String, String) with the second argument being null.

      • SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand

        public SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand(ContextClass context,
                                          java.lang.Object component,
                                          java.lang.String warningLogMessage,
                                          java.lang.String warningDisplayMessage)
        Creates a new SmartCommands.GuardedCommand, which will issue a warning log and then trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException, if an exception occurs during its execution.
        Parameters:
        context - the context from which the execution originates, and which will be used when reporting a potential exception ; it is not allowed to be
        component - the component from which the execution originates, and which will be used when reporting a potential exception ; may be @{code null}
        warningLogMessage - the log message that will be output in case of exception
        warningDisplayMessage - the (supposedly i18ned) human readable that will be transfered to the SmartCommands.GuardedException in case of exception during the command execution

    • Method Detail

      • onThrowable

        public java.lang.Throwable onThrowable(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        The implementation will log as a warning the exception.
        Specified by:
        onThrowable in interface SmartCommands.GuardedHandler
        Overrides:
        onThrowable in class SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>
        Parameters:
        throwable - the exception that has been thrown during the SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.runGuarded() execution
        Returns:
        in the case the SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.getDelegate() is null a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the provided exception, with the warningDisplayMessage as message attribute ; otherwise, the return value comes from the delegate
        See Also:
        SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.onThrowable(Throwable)
